DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to detect changes in circulatory I-FABP values (50% increase) in elderly volunteers following the combination of moderate physical activity and a standard meal.
DOC.brief_title: Changes in Circulatory I-FABP in Elderly Persons in Daily Life
DOC.criteria: 1. Age 75 years or older (both sexes) 2. Participating in the Embrace project. 1. Previous gastrointestinal resections 2. Chronic inflammatory gastrointestinal disease
